channel.title: WoW
channel.description:
Does anyone on here play World of Warcraft?
If you do and want to add me post here or add my BattleTag: Hunting#1108
Could use some people to skype and maybe play with on here game is boring by yourself!
Realm: Korgath

item.title: WoW
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

They have had commercials from gameplay before, remember Mr T? They also had Ozzie and a few other stars, they were funny.

Read full topic

item.title: WoW
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:531401”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=650191.msg4366029#msg4366029 date=1379707092]
The only thing I hate against WoW/Blizzard, is that their commercials make their game(s) graphics look better than the actual game itself. To me, it’s like push-up bras. They look nice on the outside, but once you get in/open it, you’re disappointed (at least I am).
[/quote]… that’s only the case if you have no idea what a cinematic is[/quote]
I know that the commercials are cinematic, but I’d prefer actual game play.

Read full topic
